name: adguardhome-sync
description: AdGuardHome Sync automatically synchronizes exact config and filter settings across multiple AdGuard Home instances. It helps users running multi-router or distributed setups manage consistent filtering rules without manual effort.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Keep all AdGuard Home instances perfectly synchronized. Set it and forget it

features.title: Unified Configuration
features.description: Filtering rules and settings replicate across all servers. One change, everywhere updated

features.title: Multi
features.description: Perfect for homes or businesses with multiple routers. Consistent protection everywhere

features.title: Effortless Management
features.description: Maintain uniform ad blocking without manual updates. Save time and effort

features.title: Scheduled Updates
features.description: Configure automatic synchronization on your preferred schedule. Runs when you want

features.title: Flexible Modes
features.description: Choose one-way replication or bidirectional sync as needed. Adapt to your setup

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage with straightforward deployment. Won't slow down your system

features.title: Cross
features.description: Works seamlessly across different operating systems. Universal compatibility
